title: Pokey

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Spike Up**: Everyone who visits you will be roleblocked for the next 2 nights unless they are visited in each night.
- **Sneak Up**: Pick someone, if they used an investigative ability, you will learn who they targeted and steal their feedback.
- **Regrow** (2x): Remove 2 damage from you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may use **Spike Up** on another player, it costs 1 damage plus 1 for everyone you affected.
- Once per game, you may take 3 damage to **Sneak Up** on everyone using an investigative ability tonight.

desc:
Post 3104
*That's a Pokey. It's a cactus ghoul that's got nasty spines all over its body...*
